# Type Line Severity Code Message Path Detail
1 DEFAULT 19:20 warn oas3-operation-security-defined Operation "security" values must match a scheme defined in the "components.securitySchemes" object. paths > /pub/v4.0/device > get > security > 0 > X-Key-Id

CONTEXT

Operation "security" values must match a scheme defined in the "components.securitySchemes" object.

5  version: v4.0
6  contact: {}
7openapi: 3.0.0
8servers:
9  - url: https://{customer-name}.iot.paloaltonetworks.com
10tags:
11  - description: The IoT Public APIs are listed below.
12    name: IoT Public API
13paths:
14  /pub/v4.0/device:
15    get:
16      description: "Get a list of device details for the device with the specified MAC address or, for a static IP device, the device with the specified static IP address. <br/> <b>Rate limiting</b>: 60 times per minute"
17      operationId: device-detail
18      security:
19        - X-Key-Id: []
20          X-Access-Key: []
21      summary: Get Device Details per MAC Address
22      tags:
23        - IoT Public API
24      parameters:
25        $ref: "api/public/deviceDetail.yaml#/parameters"
26      responses:
27        $ref: "api/public/deviceDetail.yaml#/responses"
28
29  /pub/v4.0/device/ip:
30    get:
31      description: "Get a list of device details for the device with the specified IP address. <br/> <b>Rate limiting</b>: 60 times per minute"
32      operationId: device-detail-ip
33      security:
34        - X-Key-Id: []

    109        - X-Key-Id: []
    110          X-Access-Key: []
    111      summary: Resolve a Security Alert
    112      tags:
    113        - IoT Public API
    114      parameters:
    115        $ref: "api/public/alertResolve.yaml#/parameters"
    116      requestBody:
    117        $ref: "api/public/alertResolve.yaml#/requestBody"
    118      responses:
    119        $ref: "api/public/alertResolve.yaml#/responses"
